date: "7 October 2015"

```{r}
path <- "output/20151006Silac/combined/txt/"

my_mqdb <- src_sqlite(file.path(path,"my_mqdb.sqlite3"))
dbListTables(my_mqdb$con )

peptides_tbl <- tbl(my_mqdb, "peptides" )

peptides_tbl %>% glimpse
bb <- peptides_tbl %>% select(Sequence,contains("Intensity"))
bb %>% glimpse

bb <- bb %>% select(Sequence, contains("20150831_03_FGCZpaolo_MSQC1_60min")) %>% arrange(Sequence)
bb1 <-bb %>%  collect 

plot(unlist(bb1[,2]),unlist(bb1[,3]))

colnames(bb1) <- c("Sequence","Unlabelled", "L", "H")

```
